page.title: 04Transport in Llanelli.
page.content: In an effort to attract more people to Llanelli both for jobs and shopping,the Borough Council are continually improving the road system through and around the town.The town centre, in this block, has a one way system which speeds the flow of traffic and eases congestion considerably.A new road has recently been opened making access to the M4 Motorway much quicker and easier.A continuation of this road to the town ring road is under construction at present. Llanelli is served by British Rail Western Region,and has a modern refurbished Station. The Bus Station is near the Town Centre and has buses to all the surrounding area,incuding Rapide Services.Only small pleasure craft use the docks now.The only working boat is a sand boat which is berthed at a small wharf
